settings.content: To display the countdown timer on a product, apply the tag 'display-countdown'. To define the max time on the countdown 'expire-x' is required, 'expire-24' for example would be a 24 hour countdown. The countdown timer is based on the original publish time of the product and is evergreen.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).
Although you will be able to display prices on your storefront in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your store's currency.

settings.content:
Deal of the day now requires 2 tags to function, the first tag 'dealoftheday' must be applied to any product that you wish to show the deal of the day on.
Next the tags 'dealoftheday-1' 'dealoftheday-2' 'dealoftheday-3' ETC can be applied with the first tag to create a range of products to be included inside of the deal of the day rotation (1 product will show per day).
You can include as many products as you would like in the deal of the day rotation.

settings.label: Enable deal of the day
settings.info: If you are not using any 'dealoftheday-NUMBER FROM 1 TO N' tag in your products, you should disable this feature. Leaving it enabled may cause a performance drop.

settings.label: Deal of the day start date
settings.info: Date format must be YYYY-MM-DD. Also if date format is not valid then deal of the day feature is disabled automatic.

name: GeoIP Enable/Disable (Helps convert international visitors but may slow down your page-load speed)

settings.label: Enable GEOIP
settings.info: Disabling the GEO IP feature will lead to a slightly faster page-load, but will turn off visitor country recognition feature and other theme features based on this code. These features include, but are not limited to: domestic delivery recognition, free shipping delivery recognition, free shipping threshold function.
